reviews.review: Господи! Игра моего детства! Спасибо за эту игру уажаемые Valve, правдо данная игра поменяла в себе всё, но всё равно остаётся одной из лучших!
Ну чё сказать, норм игра для убивалки времени.
Suçsuz yere overwathcta suçlu bulundum oynamayın ya da overwatch kaldırılsın
It is a very good game
pretty fun dont stay on casual too long play ranked
I love this game, it is my favorite. I will stay the course and turn pro.
güzel ama çok hile var bıktık hilelerden buna bi çözüm bulunsun lütfen..
HEY, SOMETIMES YOUR OPPONENT IS JUST HAVING A REALLY GOOD DAY!
herkes biliyor zaten çok guzel bir oyun oldugunu ben mi anlatiyim aq
Воооо игра топ урона нет советую
yeh not bad overall proper fun sometimes
Good game. Very fun to play
ONEOF THE BEST STEAM GAMES OUT THERE
nepacilo sa mi to ze su tam toxic hraci
Cs foi um dos jogos que me marcou desde a infância. E com cs go não é diferente. Espero que nao tornem o jogo um enfeite de cosméticos (mais do que ja é).

just go play faceit or esea dont play mm is ok . This game is good game just have many hacker so go play faceit
If u play cs, play on faceit or esea. Matchmaking is just sad
Good for getting shot in the face

Matchmaking servers unplayable. 64 tick and VAC doesnt do anything. Making the game free to play just brought back countless cheaters. Bot mechanics (controlling and ai) also make the game unplayable in case someone leaves. Ranked matchmaking never put me in the correct ranks, always had enemies and teammates, at least 4 ranks different, and always smurfs. Cant wait to play Valorant.
hate and love this game xD
